name: Zernia (Beta)
description:
Zernia is a top-down 2D adventure survival game, the player will have tasks to complete within the base throughout the day in order to protect it. 

The player will encounter different monsters as they detect the players presence, leading to storming the player and their hideout, however, these attacks tend to be unpredictable, so the player will have to think ahead and craft gadgets and tools for base protection as well as use the materials to keep the base from breaking down.

 Materials can be gathered around the Fechosia world, these will help the player keep the base afloat but also improve the players survivability as more items can be crafted, ultimately crafting the forbidden 4 legendary weapons each giving unique abilities inherited by the Alterian race.
